entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -35.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 08:16 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -35.9°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -39.4°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
